property.name: description
property.value: The unique proposal number identifying a proposal. This is a system generated, sequential number.

property.name: description
property.value: The proposed title of the project.

property.name: description
property.value: The identification number of the organization or agency that is providing support for the sponsored project.

property.name: summary
property.value: The sponsor name for the DevelopmentProposal.

property.name: description
property.value: The sponsor name for the DevelopmentProposal.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Start Date of the Proposal

property.name: description
property.value: The date the project period will begin.

property.name: summary
property.value: The End Date of the Proposal

property.name: description
property.value: The date the project period will terminate.

property.name: description
property.value: The type of activity proposed, e.g. organized research, instruction, etc.

property.name: description
property.value: The proposal's fixed home unit that will be used for routing and business rule purposes. AKA Owned by Unit.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Types that the Proposal Could be.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Types that the Proposal Could be.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Sponsor Award Number for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: A unique institutionally assigned number of a previously funded application.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Original Institutional Proposal ID for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: A unique institutionally assigned proposal number of a previously submitted proposal. This is applicable when submitting a revised (changed/corrected) application.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Deadline Date of the Proposal

property.name: description
property.value: The date in which the proposal is due to the sponsoring agency. Additional deadlines may be set by the office authorized to submit proposals on behalf of the institution (e.g. sponsored programs, etc.).

property.name: summary
property.value: The Deadline Time of the Proposal

property.name: description
property.value: The time in which the proposal is due to the sponsoring agency. Additional deadlines may be set by the office authorized to submit proposals on behalf of the institution (e.g. sponsored programs, etc.).

property.name: summary
property.value: The Deadline Type for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates the type of proposal deadline.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Prime Sponsor for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: The sponsor that provides the original source of project funding.

property.name: summary
property.value: The NSF Science Code for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: A number used to indicate the type of research activity as defined by the National Science Foundation. NSF codes are not specific for NSF proposals and/or awards.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Sponsor Division Code for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: A code that is unique to each NSF division. Currently specific to the NSF only.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Opportunity Title for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: The title of a publicly available document, announcing a federal agency's intentions to award discretionary grants or cooperative agreements, usually as a result of competition for funds. AKA Funding opportunity announcements, notices of funding availability, or solicitations.

property.name: summary
property.value: Notice of Opportunity for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: Indicates if the proposal was in response to a solicitation, the type of solicitation or if it is unsolicited.

property.name: summary
property.value: The CFDA Number for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: A unique identifier for the sponsor and the funding opportunity announcement. AKA "Catalogue of Federal Domestic Assistance Number." The format for this CFDA Number is XX.XXX

property.name: summary
property.value: The Opportunity ID for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: A unique identifier associated with each sponsor's funding opportunity announcement. AKA "Funding Opportunity Announcement number" or "FOA number"

property.name: summary
property.value: The Sponsor ID for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: The unique identifier assigned by the sponsor when the proposal was submitted.

property.name: description
property.value: The proposal will include a sub award with another institution.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Sponsor Program Code for this Proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: A code that is unique to each NSF program. Currently specific to the NSF only.

property.name: description
property.value: This field determines whether the Sponsored Programs Office or the department will be mailing the proposal to the agency/sponsor.

property.name: description
property.value: The method by which the proposal will be delivered to the agency/sponsor.

property.name: description
property.value: The internal school account number that should be charged the mailing costs.

property.name: description
property.value: The number of paper copies of the proposal that should be mailed to the agency/sponsor.

property.name: description
property.value: The name and address to whom the proposal will be mailed.

property.name: description
property.value: Any information that will assist in the delivery of the proposal.

property.name: description
property.value: The Proposal State for this Proposal Development Document

property.name: description
property.value: The Proposal State for this Proposal Development Document

property.name: description
property.value: The status of the proposal in a hierarchy.

property.name: description
property.value: The type of the budget for this proposal in a hierarchy.

property.name: description
property.value: The status of the final budget version for this Proposal Development Document

property.name: summary
property.value: The Agency Routing Identifier for this Proposal.

property.name: summary
property.value: The Prev Grants.Gov Tracking ID for this Proposal.
